title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 3759 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
January 22, 2018
On Monday, January 22, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 3759, the “Recognize, Assist, Include, Support, and Engage Family Caregivers Act of 2017,” which convenes a Family Caregiving Advisory Council and establishes and maintains a national family caregiving strategy.
